io.gearpump.streaming.appmaster

Class TaskRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.gearpump.streaming.appmaster.TaskRegistry

  • public class TaskRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
    TaskRegistry is used to track the registration of all tasks when one application is booting up.

      • registerTask

        public TaskRegistry.RegisterTaskStatus registerTask(TaskId taskId,
                                           TaskRegistry.TaskLocation location)
        When a task is booted, it need to call registerTask to register itself. If this task is valid, then accept it, otherwise reject it.

        Parameters:
        taskId - (undocumented)
        location - (undocumented)
